title: Performance Tool W4064 All Purpose Funnel, 1 Quart Capacity, Red
description: The Performance Tool W4064 Funnel boasts a versatile design, making it the ideal choice for dispensing petroleum-based fluids and a variety of other liquids. Its generous 1 quart capacity makes it suitable for both small and large jobs, while the extra-long neck design helps prevent spills and allows for more precise pouring. Constructed from high-quality materials, this funnel is built to withstand repeated use and resist damage from harsh chemicals. Thanks to its user-friendly features and simple design, the Performance Tool W4064 Funnel is easy to use and an essential tool for any garage or workshop.
